description: A prisoner escaped from their cell by digging a tunnel with a spoon.
During a prison transport, a prisoner managed to overpower the guards and escape from the vehicle.
A prisoner escaped by climbing over the fence during outdoor recreation time.
A prisoner escaped by hiding in a laundry cart and being wheeled out of the facility.
A prisoner managed to pick the lock on their cell and escape through the ventilation system.
A group of prisoners staged a riot as a diversion and several of them escaped during the chaos.
A prisoner managed to forge documents and pose as a guard to escape the facility.
A prisoner escaped by cutting through the bars on their cell using a hacksaw blade smuggled in by a visitor.
A prisoner escaped by creating a distraction during mealtime and sneaking out of the cafeteria.
A prisoner managed to bribe a guard and escape through a back exit of the facility.
A prisoner escaped by stealing a guard's uniform and walking out of the facility disguised as a staff member.
A prisoner escaped by tunneling under the perimeter fence using makeshift tools.
A prisoner managed to escape by crawling through a ventilation duct and exiting through a rooftop hatch.
A prisoner escaped by overpowering a guard and stealing their keys to unlock the cell doors.
A prisoner managed to create a fake identity and pose as a visitor to escape from the facility.
A prisoner escaped from a maximum-security prison by tunneling through the walls with a makeshift tool.
An inmate escaped from prison by hiding in a laundry cart that was being taken out of the facility.
A prisoner escaped from a transport van by picking the lock on their handcuffs and overpowering the guard.
An inmate escaped from a low-security prison by walking out of an unlocked door during a prison-wide power outage.
A prisoner escaped from a high-security prison by posing as a visitor and walking out the front gate.
An inmate escaped from a prison by climbing over a fence during a recreation period.
A prisoner escaped from a jail by creating a hole in the wall of their cell and crawling through it.
An inmate escaped from a prison by stealing the keys to a guard's car and driving away from the facility.
A prisoner escaped from a prison by sneaking into the garbage truck that was collecting trash from the facility.
An inmate escaped from a jail by convincing the guard to unlock their cell and then overpowering them.
A prisoner escaped from a prison by creating a fake ID and pretending to be a guard during a shift change.
An inmate escaped from a low-security prison by walking away from a work detail and disappearing into the surrounding woods.
A prisoner escaped from a jail by crawling through the ventilation system and exiting through a vent on the roof.
An inmate escaped from a prison by posing as a maintenance worker and walking out the front gate.
A prisoner escaped from a maximum-security prison by creating a hole in the ceiling of their cell and climbing out through it.
The prisoner escaped from their cell by tunneling through the concrete wall using makeshift tools.
The inmate managed to smuggle a hacksaw blade into the prison and used it to cut through the bars of their cell window.
The prisoner escaped during a prison transport when their accomplices ambushed the guards and helped them break free.
The inmate escaped from their cell by disabling the security cameras and picking the lock with a homemade lock-pick.
The prisoner managed to bribe a guard to leave their cell unlocked and then slipped out unnoticed.
The inmate escaped during a prison riot when the guards were too busy trying to restore order.
The prisoner escaped by disguising themselves as a guard and walking out of the prison through the front gate.
The inmate managed to create a dummy using materials from their cell and then placed it in their bed to trick the guards during a headcount.
The prisoner escaped by using a grappling hook to climb over the prison walls.
The inmate managed to steal a guard's uniform and then walked out of the prison unnoticed during a shift change.
The prisoner escaped by creating a diversion in the prison yard and then slipping out through a hole in the fence.
The inmate managed to disable the electronic door locks using a hack and then escaped from their cell.
The prisoner escaped by digging a tunnel under the prison using a spoon and other makeshift tools.
The inmate managed to steal the keys from a guard and then unlocked their cell and walked out.
The prisoner escaped by jumping over the prison walls using a makeshift trampoline made from a bedsheet.
